description: With another episode in the bag Khloe Kardashian left TV studios on Wednesday looking glam after filming her show.
title: Khloe Kardashian shows off new cornrows after filming Kocktails with Khloe
title_page: Khloe Kardashian shows off new cornrows after filming Kocktails with KhloeÂ  | Daily Mail Online
text:
With another episode in the bag Khloe Kardashian left TV studios on Wednesday looking glam after filming her new show.
The reality star, who currently hosts her own FYI series Kocktails With Khloe was pictured leaving studios with cameras still rolling in Burbank, California.
The 31-year-old star wore a stylish denim jumpsuit and sported cornrows in her hair as she left the building.
Scroll down for video
TV star coming through: Khloe Kardashian left studios on Wednesday looking stylish in a denim jumpsuit and sporting cornrows in her hair
She accessorised with chic blue suede heels and sported huge gold hoop earrings.
Khloe accentuated her tanned skin with bronze hued make-up and flashed a little cleavage in her zip-up onepiece.
For her next installment - to be aired next week - Khloe invited guests P Diddy and Snooki as well as sisters Kourtney and Kylie Jenner to appear on the relaxed format show.
See more of the latest pictures of Khloe Kardashian as she shows off her new cornrows
Chic accessories: The 31-year-old reality star carried an expensive Hermes Birkin bag as she left the building after filming Kocktails with Khloe
New look: The star showed off immaculate braids and large gold hoop earrings
The foursome were seen arriving at studios earlier in the day, ready to have a cocktail and gossip with the E! reality star.
Meanwhile this week's episode featured Kourtney's ex Scott Disick and Kylie's boyfriend Tyga - and the boys got involved in a game of 'F**k, Marry or Kill' with entertaining results.
Tyga, 26, revealed he would marry Kylie, while Scott said he would most probably kill Kim.
Done for the day: Khloe had entertained guests P Diddy and Snooki for her next installment of the FYI show
Fun and games: The second episode of Kocktails With Khloe aired on Wednesday and featured Kylie Jenner's boyfriend Tyga and Kourtney's ex Scott Disick
Khloe's BFF Malika Haqq, Youtube blogger Jenna Marbles as well as Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star Morgan Stewart were also there to join in the fun.
Ahead of the show on Wednesday Khloe captioned a picture of the stars on set: 'Tonight!! #kocktailswithkhloe 10pm on @fyi'
Kocktails With Khloe premiered on FYI last week and the reality star welcomed Brandi Glanville and Snoop Dogg on the girls' night style chat show as well as sister Kendall, 20.
Awkward: The boys were made to play the game 'F**k, Marry or Kill' but next week it will be the girls' chance to get revenge
Girl talk: Khloe's pals Morgan Stewart, Malika Haqq and Jenna Marbles were also guest's on this week's show
Earlier, Kylie, 18, was seen arriving at the studios in a grey jumpsuit and Christian Dior lace boots.
The star layered on a long black coat over the top of her outfit and carried a Givenchy handbag to complete the look.
Kylie wore her hair in soft waves and clutched her cell phone as she made her way into the studio.
Meanwhile Kourtney, 36, made her own statement in a leather jacket, smart black trousers and a racy lace bodysuit.
Designer darling: Kylie meanwhile looked stylish as she arrived at the studios earlier in the day to appear on Khloe's show
So chic: The 18-year-old KUWTK star wore a slouchy grey jumpsuit and Christian Dior lace boots
Ready for her close-up: Kylie wore her hair in soft waves and layered on a long black coat
It's been an interesting week for the Kardashian clan as it was revealed that Khloe's brother Rob, 28, is dating Kylie's former love rival Blac Chyna.
Chyna, 27, used to be engaged to the teen's boyfriend Tyga and the duo have been flaunting their new relationship on social media.
Khloe made a thinly veiled attack on her brother with an Instagram on Tuesday as she shared a photo from brother-in-law Kanye West's recording studio.
TV star: Kylie's sister Kourtney looked just as stylish in a racy red lace bodysuit, trousers and black leather jacket
Star-studded: Sean 'P Diddy' Combs also made an appearance for Khloe's show
TV stars unite: Reality star Snooki was also seen arriving to join in the fun
Khloe wrote alongside the snap: 'Never go against THE Family. I love Yeezy's studio speeches!!'
Khloe used the same words, 'never go against the family', during a series of tweets on Monday after Blac Chyna shared an Instagram snap in which she appeared to be cuddling Rob.
The 31-year-old took to Twitter, warning: 'You can do anything. But never go against the family.'
Rob has reportedly angered his family by moving out of Khloe's home and into Chyna's.
This week's mischief: Kocktails With Khloe airs on Wednesdays on FYI
Betrayed: There will be plenty for the siblings to talk about this week after their brother Rob revealed his romance with Tyga's ex-fiancee Blac Chyna via social media
The pair are also said to have bonded over their dislike of the Kardashian-Jenner sisters.
'Rob has been lonely for so long, so of course it's great for him to spend time with someone other than his sisters,' a source told People.
'Rob has also found an escape from his family nagging him about his heath. He has ignored their attempts to contact him.'
